products.name: Adidas Gazelle
products.description: Một mẫu giày cổ điển vượt thời gian từ kho lưu trữ của Adidas. Ban đầu là một đôi giày luyện tập, nay đã trở thành biểu tượng thời trang đường phố với thân giày bằng da lộn đặc trưng và thiết kế đơn giản.
products.ai_description: Một đôi sneaker cổ thấp với toàn bộ thân giày bằng da lộn. Nổi bật với logo ba sọc ở bên hông, một lớp phủ hình chữ T ở mũi giày và đế cupsole bằng cao su phẳng.

products.name: Birkenstock Arizona
products.description: Mẫu sandal hai quai mang tính biểu tượng của Birkenstock. Nổi tiếng với phần lót giày bằng vật liệu cork-latex được đúc theo đường nét bàn chân, mang lại sự thoải mái và hỗ trợ vô song.
products.ai_description: Một mẫu sandal hở mũi có hai quai bản rộng, mỗi quai có một khóa kim loại tùy chỉnh. Được chế tạo trên lót giày bằng gỗ bần (cork) và đế EVA phẳng.

products.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Low OG
products.description: Phiên bản cổ thấp của đôi sneaker huyền thoại đã bắt đầu tất cả. Mang hình bóng cổ điển của năm 1985 với nhãn hiệu 'OG', bao gồm logo Nike Air trên lưỡi gà và logo Wings ở gót giày.
products.ai_description: Một đôi sneaker kiểu dáng bóng rổ cổ thấp. Thân giày bằng da với các lỗ thông hơi ở mũi giày. Nổi bật với logo Nike Swoosh cổ điển ở bên hông và logo Air Jordan Wings ở gót.

products.name: Adidas Adizero Evo SL
products.description: An ultralight performance runner engineered for racing and personal bests. Streamlined design with advanced foam technology.
products.ai_description: Minimalist running shoe with a thin, translucent mesh upper. Lightweight foam midsole with a rocker geometry. Minimal rubber outsole for grip.

products.name: Air Jordan 4 Retro OG ‘White Cement’ 2016
products.description: The iconic Jordan 4 Retro combines heritage design and modern comfort for everyday wear.
products.ai_description: Classic yet timeless. Perfect for sneaker collectors and casual wear.

products.name: Adidas Samba OG ‘White Black Gum’
products.description: A timeless streetwear classic — the Samba OG offers premium leather and vintage style.
products.ai_description: Minimalist design with retro charm. Great for daily casual looks.

products.name: Nike Air Force 1 ’07 ‘Triple White’
products.description: The all-time favorite Air Force 1 Low features clean lines and classic white leather.
products.ai_description: Versatile and iconic. A must-have sneaker for any wardrobe.

products.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All-Stars High-top
products.description: The legendary Converse high-tops — versatile, durable, and effortlessly stylish.
products.ai_description: Casual yet expressive. Perfect for creative personalities.

products.name: Vans Old Skool OG Black White
products.description: The classic low-top skate shoe featuring the iconic sidestripe. Durable canvas/suede construction for versatile street style.
products.ai_description: Black suede/canvas low-top with thick white leather sidestripe, white laces, and stitching. White vulcanized midsole/brown waffle outsole.

products.name: Adidas Adizero Sl2
products.description: A lightweight running shoe built for speed and daily training. Features responsive cushioning in a breathable mesh upper.
products.ai_description: Lightweight mesh upper (often white/black) with three signature stripes. Cushioned foam midsole with color accents. Durable rubber outsole.

products.name: Polo Ralph Lauren Court VLC Shoes
products.description: Classic court-inspired sneaker with a clean, vulcanized finish. Features the iconic Polo logo for a timeless, preppy aesthetic.
products.ai_description: Low-top canvas sneaker (typically white). Embroidered Polo player logo on the side. White rubber midsole with foxing tape. Brown gum or white outsole.

products.name: Adidas Supernova Rise
products.description: A comfortable daily trainer for everyday runs. Balances support and energy return with new Dreamstrike+ cushioning.
products.ai_description: Engineered mesh upper with padded collar. Thick, cushioned midsole (e.g., Dreamstrike+ foam). Support rods visible. Black rubber outsole.

products.name: On Cloudnova 2 New Generation All White
products.description: The all-day sneaker with next-gen CloudTec cushioning. Fuses performance tech with a minimalist, street-ready 'All White' design.
products.ai_description: Monochromatic all-white low-top sneaker. Sock-like upper construction. Signature midsole with individual 'Cloud' pods (CloudTec).

products.name: Rigorer AR Skate Shoes 'Full White'
products.description: A clean, skate-inspired silhouette from Rigorer. This 'Full White' colorway offers minimalist style for casual, off-court wear.
products.ai_description: All-white leather or synthetic upper. Low-top design with a padded collar. Flat white vulcanized-style midsole and matching outsole.

products.name: Dr. Martens 1461 Smooth Leather Oxford Shoes
products.description: The iconic 3-eye unisex shoe. Crafted from durable smooth leather with signature yellow stitching and an air-cushioned sole.
products.ai_description: Black smooth leather low-cut shoe with 3 eyelets. Visible yellow welt stitching. Translucent, grooved PVC air-cushioned sole.

products.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Clean 'n Preme
products.description: A premium, minimalist take on the timeless Chuck Taylor. Elevated materials and clean lines redefine the classic silhouette.
products.ai_description: Classic Chuck Taylor silhouette (high-top or low-top). Premium canvas or leather upper. White rubber toe cap and midsole. Minimalist branding.

products.name: NEW BALANCE X AIMÉ LEON DORE 860V2 Blue Mesh Retro
products.description: A retro-tech runner redefined by Aimé Leon Dore. Blends early 2010s performance aesthetics with ALD's signature refined style.
products.ai_description: Retro running shoe with a blue open-mesh base. Silver and gold metallic synthetic overlays. N-ergy foam midsole (off-white). Black rubber outsole.

products.name: Air Jordan 3 Retro 'Pure Money'
products.description: The iconic Air Jordan 3 in a pristine 'Pure Money' colorway. Features an all-white tumbled leather upper with metallic silver details.
products.ai_description: All-white mid-top basketball shoe. Tumbled leather upper. Signature elephant print overlays in light grey. Visible Air unit in the heel.

products.name: Timberland 3-Eye Lug Handsewn Boat 'Brown'
products.description: The classic handsewn boat shoe upper fused with a rugged Timberland lug sole. Premium brown leather for a timeless, durable style.
products.ai_description: Brown full-grain leather upper. Handsewn moc-toe construction. 360-degree rawhide lacing system. Thick, chunky rubber lug outsole.

products.name: Vans Classic Authentic Red
products.description: The original Vans heritage shoe. A simple low-top, lace-up profile with a durable red canvas upper and signature waffle outsole.
products.ai_description: Vibrant red canvas low-top. Metal eyelets and white laces. White vulcanized midsole with black foxing stripe. Brown waffle outsole.

products.name: Vans Classic SK8-HI Black/White
products.description: The legendary lace-up high-top skate shoe. Features durable suede/canvas uppers, padded collars, and the iconic sidestripe.
products.ai_description: Black suede/canvas high-top. White leather sidestripe and white laces. Padded ankle collar. White vulcanized midsole/brown waffle outsole.

products.name: Nike Dunk High Retro 'Cargo Khaki'
products.description: The '80s basketball icon returns. This retro features a classic two-tone look with a white leather base and 'Cargo Khaki' overlays.
products.ai_description: White leather high-top with 'Cargo Khaki' (olive green) overlays. Khaki Swoosh, laces, and outsole. White nylon tongue and white midsole.

products.name: Carry Barrette Cowhide Classic Loafer
products.description: A timeless loafer crafted from genuine cowhide. Features a classic barrette strap across the vamp for a polished, sophisticated look.
products.ai_description: Smooth cowhide leather loafer (often black or brown). Classic silhouette with a barrette strap detail across the vamp. Low stacked heel.

products.name: Polo Ralph Lauren velvet loafer
products.description: An elegant slip-on crafted from plush velvet. Features the signature Polo embroidered logo for a refined, luxurious aesthetic.
products.ai_description: Plush velvet upper (e.g., black, navy). Embroidered Polo logo or crest on the vamp. Quilted satin lining. Low stacked heel.

products.name: Horsebit Loafers Dark Brown Calf
products.description: An iconic loafer silhouette in rich dark brown calf leather. Defined by the signature polished metal horsebit hardware.
products.ai_description: Dark brown calfskin leather upper. Polished gold or silver-tone horsebit hardware on the vamp. Moc-toe construction. Low stacked heel.

products.name: Leisure Handsewn Color 8 Shell Cordovan
products.description: An iconic handsewn penny loafer. Crafted from luxurious 'Color 8' (deep burgundy) Shell Cordovan leather for unmatched durability.
products.ai_description: 'Color 8' (deep burgundy) shell cordovan leather. Handsewn moc-toe with a classic penny strap. Leather sole and stacked heel.

products.name: The Sean Lady Wolf Penny Loafer - Brown & OFF-WHITE
products.description: A modern, two-tone penny loafer. Features a striking combination of brown and off-white leather, often paired with a chunky lug sole.
products.ai_description: Two-tone leather upper (brown and off-white). Classic penny strap design. Chunky or exaggerated rubber lug sole for a modern look.

products.name: Adidas Samba Wales Bonner Silver
products.description: A Wales Bonner collaboration on the iconic Samba. Features a striking metallic silver upper with signature crochet details and a gum sole.
products.ai_description: Metallic silver leather upper. Crochet three-stripes (e.g., cream). Suede T-toe overlay. Elongated fold-over tongue. Gum rubber sole.

products.name: Gucci Brixton collapsible-heel leather loafer
products.description: Gucci's iconic horsebit loafer in soft leather. Features a unique collapsible heel, allowing it to be worn as a loafer or a mule.
products.ai_description: Smooth leather loafer (often black). Gold-tone horsebit hardware on the vamp. Almond toe. Soft, foldable leather at the heel.

products.name: Saint Laurent Wyatt Chelsea Boots In Suede 'Brown'
products.description: The iconic YSL Chelsea boot in rich brown suede. Features elastic side panels, an almond toe, and a signature stacked Cuban heel.
products.ai_description: Brown suede upper. Ankle-high Chelsea boot design. Elastic side panels. Leather pull-tab. Stacked Cuban heel. Leather sole.

products.name: Wrangler Yuma Men's Leather Lace Up Combat Boots
products.description: A rugged men's combat boot by Wrangler. Features a durable leather upper, lace-up front, and a chunky rubber sole for everyday wear.
products.ai_description: Leather upper (brown or black). Ankle-high combat boot style. Lace-up closure with eyelets/hooks. Padded collar. Thick rubber lug sole.

products.name: ECCO Ult-Trn (m)
products.description: A lightweight hiking shoe built for the trails. Combines a modern aesthetic with ECCO's comfort technology and a high-grip rubber outsole.
products.ai_description: Modern hiking shoe. Mixed synthetic/textile upper. Lightweight PHORENE midsole. High-traction rubber outsole (often Michelin).

products.name: New Balance 993 Made in USA
products.description: The iconic Made in USA runner. Blends premium suede and mesh with classic ABZORB cushioning for superior comfort and timeless style.
products.ai_description: Classic grey suede overlays with grey mesh underlays. Reflective 'N' logo. Bulky ABZORB midsole. 'USA' branding on the heel.

products.name: Nike ACG Air Mowabb 'Rattan Birch'
products.description: The iconic ACG hiking silhouette. Features a neoprene inner bootie, durable nubuck upper, and a speckled midsole for rugged, retro style.
products.ai_description: Tan ('Rattan') nubuck upper. Blue/orange neoprene bootie. Huarache-like heel support system. Speckled grey midsole. Black/tan outsole.

products.name: And Wander x Salomon Odyssey 1
products.description: A Salomon long-distance hiker, reimagined by And Wander. Blends technical trail performance with a minimalist, functional aesthetic.
products.ai_description: Technical synthetic upper (often monochrome). Welded overlays. Reflective details. Quicklace system. High-cushion, stable midsole.

products.name: Asics Gel-Kayano 14 'Black Glacier Grey'
products.description: A 2000s retro-tech runner. Features a black mesh base, metallic silver overlays, and visible GEL technology for all-day comfort.
products.ai_description: Black mesh upper with metallic silver/grey synthetic overlays. Classic Asics stripes. White midsole with visible GEL units. Black outsole.

products.name: Salomon XT-6 Gore-Tex 'Black/Silver'
products.description: The iconic trail runner, updated with a waterproof Gore-Tex membrane. Built for harsh conditions without sacrificing its signature style.
products.ai_description: Black waterproof upper with synthetic welded overlays. GORE-TEX branding. Quicklace system. Two-tone ACS midsole. Contagrip outsole.

products.name: Salomon x END. XT-6 'Porcini'
products.description: An END. collaboration on the XT-6, inspired by 'Porcini' mushrooms. Features a unique, earthy color palette of brown, tan, and beige.
products.ai_description: Mesh upper with earthy tones (beige/brown). Synthetic welded overlays. Quicklace system. ACS midsole. 'END.' branding.

products.name: New Balance 530 'White Natural Indigo'
products.description: A classic 2000s running shoe. Features a breathable white mesh upper with silver and 'Natural Indigo' (navy) overlays.
products.ai_description: White mesh upper. Metallic silver and navy blue synthetic overlays. White 'N' logo with navy outline. ABZORB midsole. Black outsole.

products.name: Biti's Hunter X white
products.description: A popular lifestyle sneaker from Vietnamese brand Biti's. This all-white version features a lightweight knit upper and cushioned sole.
products.ai_description: All-white knit or mesh upper. Modern, sock-like construction. Cushioned white foam midsole. Tonal branding. Rubber outsole pods.

products.name: Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Oxidized Green'
products.description: The iconic AJ4 in a clean colorway. Features a premium white leather upper with 'Oxidized Green' accents on the eyelets and midsole.
products.ai_description: White leather upper with white mesh panels. Metallic 'Oxidized Green' eyelets and midsole details. Jumpman logo. Visible Air heel unit.

products.name: ASICS GEL-KAYANO 14
products.description: A 2000s retro-tech runner, prized for its layered aesthetic. Combines a breathable mesh upper with metallic overlays and visible GEL cushioning.
products.ai_description: Layered mesh upper (often white/silver). Metallic synthetic overlays. Asics stripes on the side. White midsole with visible GEL units.

products.name: Adidas Handball Spezial
products.description: A '70s indoor handball classic, now a streetwear staple. Features a premium suede upper and a distinctive dark gum rubber outsole.
products.ai_description: Suede upper in various colors. Contrast leather three-stripes and heel tab. Gold foil 'Spezial' branding. Dark gum rubber sole.

products.name: Adidas Forum Low
products.description: The iconic '80s basketball shoe, reimagined in a low-top. Defined by its premium leather upper and signature removable ankle strap.
products.ai_description: Leather upper (typically white with color accents). Perforated toe box. Signature velcro ankle strap. Three-stripes. Rubber cupsole.
